summary: Improve Mission functionality: faster task addition after navigation, smooth task completion toggling with immediate progress updates, and responsive swipe-to-delete for missions; no changes to other app areas.
architectural_notes: Scope constraint: Changes must be limited strictly to Mission functionality; do not modify other app features.

existing_features.title: In the Mission detail screen, make adding a task feel immediate and remain reliable even when the user navigates away in the app and later returns to the same mission to add tasks again (i.e., the mission detail view should always show the latest tasks and allow instant task creation).

In the Mission detail screen, make toggling a task between completed and not completed smooth and bug-free, without causing incorrect changes to other tasks, and with immediate mission progress updates.
Make swipe-to-delete in the Missions list respond immediately: deleting a mission via swipe should remove it from the list right away and refresh the missions list state reliably.

new_feature_requests.summary: Mission: Make adding a task to a mission immediate, including when returning to a mission after navigating elsewhere in the app.
Mission: Smoothly toggle task completion/uncompletion without affecting other tasks, with immediate mission progress update.
Mission: Swipe-to-delete mission should work immediately and refresh the missions list.

projectName: Fix Mission task add/toggle responsiveness and swipe-to-delete immediacy
